changelog: v1.4.5: Hotfix - NameError in /api/autofix on success path (ALLOWED_FIXES reference); CSS orphan removed; footer version corrected.
changes: Hotfix: /api/autofix success path crashed with NameError (WHITELIST -> ALLOWED_FIXES)
CSS: removed orphaned rule block in dashboard.html
UI: footer version corrected from v1.0 to v1.4.5
Lean server rewrite: ~40% less overhead, hot path is pure in-memory
Privacy-safe install telemetry: anonymous UUID, hardware class only
CRITICAL FIX: 404 on launch resolved (ASSET_DIR/DATA_DIR split)
Thread safety: _log_lock, _hw_lock guard all shared state
First-poll network spike false positive eliminated (_net_warmed_up)
Rate limiting pruned at 500 IPs to prevent memory growth
Feedback message injection sanitized (newlines, null bytes stripped)
Log flush now correctly fires on shutdown (missing @app.route fixed)
WMI COM calls isolated to background thread (no main thread blocking)
